short_summary: Requests for Information for the RFP: Letter of interest for the development of AOS supporting technologies
description: Through the contract of interest, the Solicitation Document and the resulting Contract Document will be made available to bidders of the Request for Proposal (RFP) by the Government of Canada, in order for them to submit proposal. This will enable the Canadian space technology development programming and the Government of Canada to assess and potentially provide funding to these programs.
